Title: The Nightmare Man (1)
Plot: When Luke has his first nightmare, he's haunted by a dark figure from his dreams. A strange entity is reaching out to our world, with terrible consequences for the whole human race. Luke faces life-changing events, and Bannerman Road will never be the same again.
GuestStars: Julian Bleach, Doon Mackichan, Paul Kasey, Toby Longworth
